item.description:
National event, organized by Farm Sanctuary

Sunday, March 13, 2005, 9 - 5, followed by "Cowtail party" 5 - 7 p.m.
Boston Marriot Copley Place, Boston
(one block from the Green Line Copley Sq. T stop & the Orange Line Back Bay T stop)

Outstanding, accomplished speakers (including British Columbia, Canada!) for this , held right at our doorstep!

Historic gathering of experts in animal advocacy and vegetarian/vegan nutrition.
Registration deadline is extended to Monday, March 7 midnight
Register online now at
http://www.farmsanctu...

$45 registration includes a vegan lunch and "Cowtail party"

We will hear top national experts speak about Optimal Vegan Nutrition, Factory Farming, Sentience in Farm Animals, Animal Agriculture and Disease, and much, much more -- speakers include Gene Bauston, Prez of Farm Sanctuary; Wayne Pacelle, CEO of HSUS; renowned nutrition author Brenda Davis, RD; Holly Cheever, DVD, VP of AVAR; Lauren Ornelas, Exec. Dir. of Viva!USA, and vegan MD Michael Greger.


We will learn about legislation being filed by Farm Sanctuary in Massachusetts for the 2005 legislative session, and how we can help advance its passage. Legislation would ban 3 egregious practices in factory farming:
1) Veal crates
see photos at http://www.freefarman...
2) Pig gestation crates
see photos at http://www.freefarman...
3) Force feeding of ducks for fois gras (goose liver paste)
http://www.nofoiegras...

Monday, March 14, 10 a.m. - noon -- Join in a peaceful rally at the State House to speak out to the press about the need for humane reform and urge passage of these crucial bills.

All those who long for a just, compassionate society for all beings will find inspiration, information, and direction at this event.


For more information, see http://www.farmsanctu...

group.name: The Boston Event Planning Meetup Group

item.name: Farm Animal Forum! Sunday 3/13 - All Day - Vegan Food Provided - $45
